titlepage.titleproper: Register of the Anna V.S. Mitchell Papers, 1920-1944
titlepage.publisher:
Hoover Institution Archives
Stanford University
Stanford, California
titlepage.p: © 1999 Hoover Institution Archives. All rights reserved.

did.head: Descriptive Summary

physdesc.label: Collection Size
physdesc.extent: 6 manuscript boxes, 9 envelopes, 1 oversize album, 4 medals.

did.abstract: Correspondence, memoranda, reports, clippings, memorabilia, and photographs, relating to World War I relief work in France, 1915-1920, and relief work with Russian refugees in Istanbul, 1921-1936.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Anna V.S. Mitchell Papers , [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

chronitem.event: worked in Paris with French Institution for the Blind at Reuilly
served in canteen for Belgians in Calais and for the French at Bar-le-Duc
organized and directed Cantine des Deux Drapeaux at Chalon-sur-Marne under the American Red Cross
head of Post de Secours in the region of Colonne-sur-la-Lyse Pas de Calais
relief work for Russian refugees in Istanbul

scopecontent.p: Correspondence, arranged alphabetically by name of corresponent.

scopecontent.p: Correspondence, memoranda, reports, minutes of meetings, lists, etc., arranged alphabetically by subject.
